item.title: Highly Cited Researcher 2025
item.description: We are honored to announce that Gioele La Manno has been recognized as a Highly Cited Researcher for 2025 by Clarivate Analytics. For the third consecutive year, this recognition acknowledges the significant influence and impact of our research. This distinction is awarded to roughly 1 in 1,000 researchers globally whose publications are among the most frequently cited, reflecting sustained and broad impact in their field. Thank you to all our collaborators, lab members, and the broader research community for their support and engagement with our work.

item.title: Highly Cited Researcher 2024
item.description: We are honored to announce that Gioele La Manno has been recognized as a Highly Cited Researcher for 2024 by Clarivate Analytics. For the second consecutive year, this recognition acknowledges the significant influence and impact of our research in single-cell genomics, RNA velocity methods, and computational biology for understanding developmental processes. Thank you to all our collaborators and the broader research community for their support and engagement with our work.

item.title: Highly Cited Researcher 2023
item.description: We are pleased to announce that Gioele La Manno has been recognized as a Highly Cited Researcher for 2023 by Clarivate Analytics. This recognition is awarded to researchers who have demonstrated significant and broad influence in their field, as measured by highly cited papers ranking in the top 1% by citations for their field and publication year in the Web of Science. The recognition reflects the impact of our work in single-cell genomics, RNA velocity, and computational methods for understanding brain development.
